channel.title: [317]The Wildy OSRS | IRON MAN | Very stable eco | join in if you like grinding
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XM8kvo3.png[/img]
[url=http://uppit.com/sqeed89svg00/TheWildy.jar] [img]http://i.imgur.com/H0sJnha.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LFH2Tg3.png[/img]
[b] Us here at The Wildy want to provide a high quality OSRS experience with a private server twist. We want players to experience a challenging but rewarding experience playing The Wildy. Instead we provide many options to achieve those goals easily. We are a 100% economy based server but you will have the option to choose between different exp modes. [/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JzLj8Sa.png[/img] [b]Our economy is set up to reward every player despite what game mode they prefer (PvP, PvM, Skilling). There are many markets for you to exploit and succeed here in The Wildy.[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gtkD76r.png[/img][b] Full Barrows Social Slayer Quick prayers Full Pest Control Godwars Custom Minigames Hunter All Skills Full Bank Tabs with searching Iron Man Mode Switchable Exp Modes Emblems OSRS Wilderness Bosses OSRS Weapons Correct weapon specials and attacks Full Clan Chat Achievements[/b] [b]100% dwarf cannon[/b] [b]Multiple bosses[/b] [b]Zulrah[/b] [b]Toxic Blow Pipe[/b] [b]Weekly events[/b] [b]Superb combat && Much more.... [/b] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/18ce665231234bff4125f56df5752575.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3d27d38cc9e394c467ac8a09bc4e6e3b.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1f1f6b959a32f1c0839c949a173bb581.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/2a11f033129d4fb1529bd0a1823b0cc9.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/66338f015d28fe6ac1ec187cb097488e.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/9c4fddd76dd6ba00c57ce5bef76073b2.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/29b74cf4202f21a2306ecbf196ec2edb.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KQBuos7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/alFpyYY.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tuPWpwG.png[/img] [/center]
I hope to see you online. OT: I am not the owner of this server

item.title: [317]The Wildy OSRS | IRON MAN | Very stable eco | join in if you like grinding
item.dc:creator: @nerd123456789 ...nerd123456789
item.description:
@nerd123456789 wrote:

[center]

XM8kvo3.png723×212



Us here at The Wildy want to provide a high quality OSRS experience with a private server twist. We want players to experience a challenging but rewarding experience playing The Wildy. Instead we provide many options to achieve those goals easily. We are a 100% economy based server but you will have the option to choose between different exp modes.


Our economy is set up to reward every player despite what game mode they prefer (PvP, PvM, Skilling). There are many markets for you to exploit and succeed here in The Wildy.


Full Barrows
Social Slayer
Quick prayers
Full Pest Control
Godwars
Custom Minigames
Hunter
All Skills
Full Bank Tabs with searching
Iron Man Mode
Switchable Exp Modes
Emblems
OSRS Wilderness Bosses
OSRS Weapons
Correct weapon specials and attacks
Full Clan Chat
Achievements
100% dwarf cannon
Multiple bosses
Zulrah
Toxic Blow Pipe
Weekly events
Superb combat
&&
Much more…






9c4fddd76dd6ba00c57ce5bef76073b2.gif766×500

29b74cf4202f21a2306ecbf196ec2edb.gif756×498



tuPWpwG.png744×457

[/center]

I hope to see you online.
OT: I am not the owner of this server
